product_overview: Testsprite is an interactive sales training platform leveraging AI-driven roleplay simulations, AI tutoring, and administrative tools to enhance sales skills and product knowledge through immersive and persistent learning experiences.
core_goals: Enable realistic sales roleplay scenarios with AI customers to improve sales techniques.
Provide an AI-powered tutor for continual learning and quick access to sales tips and product knowledge.
Offer administrators comprehensive controls to manage users, content, and system settings efficiently.
Ensure a seamless, intuitive user experience with voice interactions and persistent session histories.
Support multi-platform usage including reliable data persistence and mobile compatibility.
key_features: Sales Lab with setup, AI-driven interactive chat, voice interaction using speech-to-text and text-to-speech, and detailed feedback generation.
AI Chatbot (AI Tutor) supporting markdown rendered responses, voice mode, and persistent chat history for effective learning.
Admin Console featuring user, content, product, and system management with simulated backend APIs.
Study Room with tabbed navigation for organizing various study materials.
Home Dashboard providing an overview of user progress and direct quick access to platform features.
State management using Zustand and IndexedDB for reliable persistence and data storage across sessions.
user_flow_summary: User enters Sales Lab and proceeds through stages: Setup -> Roleplay Chat with AI customer -> Feedback on performance.
User interacts with AI Tutor via chat interface, receiving parsed responses with summaries and detailed info, optionally in voice mode.
Admin logs into Admin Console to manage users, content, and system settings.
User accesses Study Room to review educational content organized in tabs.
User visits Home Dashboard for progress overview and navigational shortcuts.
validation_criteria: Sales Lab transitions smoothly through Setup, Chat, and Feedback steps without errors.
In Sales Lab Auto Mode, TTS plays fully and then microphone activates automatically for STT input.
Sales Lab sessions terminate naturally when user says goodbye or indicates purchase intent.
AI Chatbot splits long responses into clear summaries and details, rendering markdown correctly including tables and bold text.
Chat histories are saved and restored correctly using IndexedDB or LocalStorage.
Chat interface on mobile devices does not get obscured by on-screen keyboards, ensuring usability.
